title: Citron Noodles with Miso Garlic Butter
description: Coated in a silky, garlic-spiked, miso butter, these citron noodles are a celebration of spring produce. Fava beans and citron zest mingle with the pasta, crunchy furikake joins the party, then everything gets a feisty chili crisp finish. Continue reading Citron Noodles with Miso Garlic Butter on 101 Cookbooks
author: Heidi Swanson
